items.sentence: Though he lives within a stone's throw of the school, he is often late.
Mary told Tom to go easy on the ice cream if he didn't want to get fat.
Tom gets a good feeling inside when people laugh heartily at his jokes.
We'll do everything we can to make sure that this doesn't happen again.
If it were not for electricity, our civilized life would be impossible.
The fruit is similar to an orange in shape and to a pineapple in taste.
My grandmother walks faster than me, and plays tennis better than I do.
If you want to lose weight, you should cut down on between-meal snacks.
A blue suit, white shirt and red tie are required for all male workers.
I advised the shy young man to declare his love for the beautiful girl.
